title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: The ControlExampleText component emits a beeping sound when selecting the SWT.MULTI option. This behavior seems incorrect and is not expected.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons in the ControlExampleText also produces the bell sound.
EB: Clicking on the SWT.MULTI option should not result in a beeping sound, and selecting other buttons should not produce any sound either.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch Build F1 (20020521) on Win2K.
2. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
3. Go to the Text tab.
4. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE option.
5. Click back on the Styles SWT.MULTI option.
